description:
Since our firm's founding in 1962, the attorneys at Mast Law Firm have worked diligently to provide legal services delivered with efficiency, affordability and professionalism to the residents of Johnston and Wake counties. Today, at both of our law firm's locations, including our branch law office in Garner, we continue to work hard to provide high-quality representation to clients from throughout eastern North Carolina who face legal challenges in the following practice areas:

  • Family law
  • Personal injury
  • Estate planning
  • Traffic tickets

Our law firm is home to eight dedicated attorneys with decades of legal experience in their chosen areas. Their combination of experience ensures our clients receive the help they need from attorneys who understand their situations and know how to direct them as they work toward their legal goals, whether their needs stem from traffic accidents, divorce, speeding tickets or estate-related issues.

Regardless of the area into which your legal need falls, you can put your trust in the legal team at Mast Law Firm. By taking advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation on injury matters at our law office in Garner, you can discover why our law firm has been the first choice for so many North Carolinians for more than 50 years.
